title: What Happened to Atlantis? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/22/17
itunes:title: What Happened to Atlantis? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/22/17
description:
George Noory and guest David Brody discuss the location of the remains of the mythical continent of Atlantis, and whether there are any remnants to be found today.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
